description:
This course is about helping you become a more successful negotiator, in business and in life.

- 8 different lectures distilled from decades of experience

- Designed to help you step by step, starting with the basics and moving through advanced strategies

- 8 different viewpoints on negotiating

- How to plan your strategy

- Important negotiating rules

- How to develop your game-plan

- 3 critical factors in negotiating

- Important power plays

- Assessing your strengths

- Important negotiating mistakes to avoid

- Over 2 hours of thought provoking and stimulating information
title: Successful Negotiating for Savvy Women
